item.title: simple alert monitoring using simplemonitor
item.description:
googling: https://www.google.com/search?q=simple+alert+monitoring https://jamesoff.github.io/simplemonitor/ googling: https://www.google.com/search?q=simplemonitor+docker https://hub.docker.com/r/braindoctor/simplemonitor-docker/ mkdir -p /docker/simplemonitor && cd /docker/simplemonitor cat > docker-compose.yml <version: ‘3.2’ services:   simplemonitor:     restart: always     image: braindoctor/simplemonitor-docker:latest     container_name: simplemonitor     hostname: mail-124.indonesiadot.com     volumes:       - ${PWD}/config:/etc/simplemonitor     ports:       - “8080:8080”
EOFdocker-compose up -d ref: https://simplemonitor.readthedocs.io/en/feature-docs/getting-started.html#writing-configuration-files
